description: Reposition main entrance door, replacement ground floor windows and first floor kitchen window, removal of white render to expose brickwork at part rear first floor level; formation of bathroom window at rear first floor level and associated internal alterations. Removal of ground floor windows and main entrance door on West facade; removal of 1st floor kitchen window; repositioning of main entrance to centre of building; replace main entrance door by Victorian-style door; replacement of 3 removed windows with 3 sash windows. Partial removal and repair of white render on East facade to expose yellow brickwork; forming of opening for new bathroom window; installation of bathroom window to match the existing sash window in Bedroom 02 in appearance and size. Internal creation of additional storage area and dressing area to replace ground floor entrance lobby; repositioning of kitchen cupboards on 1st floor.
site_name: Powis Lodge, Powis Square, LONDON, W11 2AX
